text: Need Emma Thompson for Supercheap Auto campaign. Budget around $2,996, looking for 1 x Podcast guest, 2 x Facebook post, 1 x Instagram post, 2 x Media interview. 12 week exclusivity from other similar brands. Campaign runs January 2026.
